ca.ualberta.team7project.models

Class ThreadPersistenceModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team7project.models.ThreadPersistenceModel

  • public class ThreadPersistenceModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is deprecated; do not use it

    Provided methods for storing and loading from the ElasticSearch server and the disk. Under the new model, this class is no longer referenced by any part of our working project.

    • Method Detail

      • PullTopic

        public ThreadModel PullTopic(java.util.UUID topicID)
        Fetch a single topic from the Elastic Search server
        Parameters:
        topicID - the topic's Elastic Search index, generated by java UUID
        Returns:
        The up-to-date topic from the server

      • PullBestTopics

        public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadModel> PullBestTopics(ThreadPersistenceModel.SortMethod sortMethod,
                                              java.lang.Integer maxTopics)
        Fetch the most relevant topics by some sorting criteria, up to (maxTopics) number of topics

        Topics may be fetched by the following criteria:

        • most recently updated
        • top-level comment closest to the user's set location
        • both of the above
        Parameters:
        maxTopics - the max amount of topics to pull
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of topics, containing from 0 to (maxTopics) elements

      • GetUpdatedTopic

        public ThreadModel GetUpdatedTopic(ThreadModel topic)
        Fetch the most up-to-date version of a topic from the server

        Checks if the topic's data has changed. If the topic has changed, returns the updated topic (the caller should save the updated topic to disk)

        For now, this simply pulls the entire topic from server and compare. We may later add in a timestamp comparison before pulling to increase efficiency

        Parameters:
        topic - the existing topic that needs to be updated
        Returns:
        The most up-to-date version of the topic

      • PushTopic

        public void PushTopic(ThreadModel topic)
        Push a topic to the server
        Parameters:
        topic - an updated topic in memory

      • SaveTopicListToDisk

        public void SaveTopicListToDisk(java.util.LinkedList<ThreadModel> topics)
        Saves an entire topic list to disk

        Should be called every time the data changes ie.

        • after pulling topics from the server
        • after submitting/editing comments (overlaps with above)
        • after deleting topics for caching purposes

        Because the TopicPersistenceClass has no knowledge of the TopicListModel, it will probably be neccasary to call this method from outside the class

        Parameters:
        topics - the entire list of topics to save

      • LoadTopicListFromDisk

        public java.util.LinkedList<ThreadModel> LoadTopicListFromDisk()
        Loads the entire topic list from disk

        Should be called on app startup only

        Returns:
        A LinkedList of TopicModel for initializing a TopicListModel
